title: Information Literacy Competency Enhancement Workshop for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet search skills and experience applying job-related introductory information
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, focusing on information utilization skills applicable to fieldwork.

learning_goals: Learners can identify trustworthy sources with over 80% accuracy when searching for job-related information.
Learners can apply proper citation methods in practice, considering copyright and ethical issues when utilizing information.
Learners can collaboratively develop information-gathering strategies with peer practitioners to solve workplace problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
